english_translation: And Wakee said: from al-A'mash: Yahya ibn Wathab, when he was in prayer, was as if he was addressing a man [addressing someone]. We are told by Ubayd Allah ibn Musa, he said: We were narrated to by al-A'mash, he said: I saw Yahya ibn Wathab praying in a mosque. He said: Yahya ibn Wathab died in Kufa in the year one hundred and three (AH), during the caliphate of Yazid ibn Abd al-Malik, and he was trustworthy, few in hadith, a master of the Quran.
